mapper.sql: menu_id, menu_name, menu_url, menu_parentid, menu_order, module_id, menu_level, menu_status, menu_ico
mapper.select: SELECT B.menu_id, B.menu_name, B.menu_Url, B.menu_ParentId, B.menu_order, B.module_Id, B.menu_level, B.menu_ico FROM tbl_user_menu_Info A inner join sys_menu_list B ON A.menu_id = B.menu_id inner join tbl_users_Info C ON A.YgId = C.YgId WHERE A.YgId = #{ygid} and B.menu_status = 1 and C.Ygzt = 1 ORDER BY B.menu_order
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu_list (menu_name, menu_url, menu_parentid, menu_order, module_id, menu_level, menu_status, menu_ico) values (#{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuParentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuStatus,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{menuIco,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into sys_menu_list
menu_name,
menu_url,
menu_parentid,
menu_order,
module_id,
menu_level,
menu_status,
menu_ico,

mapper.update:
update sys_menu_list
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_parentid = #{menuParentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_order = #{menuOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_level = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_status = #{menuStatus,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
menu_ico = #{menuIco,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_menu_list set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_parentid = #{menuParentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_order = #{menuOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_level = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_status = #{menuStatus,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, menu_ico = #{menuIco,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
